definition.name: NXuser
definition.doc: Template of user's contact information. The format allows more than one user with the same affiliation and contact information, but a second NXuser group should be used if they have different affiliations, etc.

field.name: name
field.doc: Name of user responsible for this entry

field.name: role
field.doc: Role of user responsible for this entry. Suggested roles are "local_contact", "principal_investigator", and "proposer"

field.name: facility_user_id
field.doc: facility based unique identifier for this person e.g. their identification code on the facility address/contact database
